definition[0]: to wash something by pouring a lot of water over it or into it
example[0]: Get a bucket to swill the yard down.
definition[1]: if a liquid swills around or you swill it around, it moves around something
example[1]: He swilled his brandy gently round his glass.
definition[2]: to drink something in large amounts
example[2]: He does nothing but swill beer all day.
definition[3]: food for pigs, mostly made of unwanted bits of human food
definition[4]: the act of washing something by pouring a lot of water over it
